issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The license in some java files are not same as others. Submit a patch to fix this!

This message was automatically generated.
Just license modifications, and did not change any unit tests and source codes. The findbugs and unit test failures are unrelated!
[~sunilg], hi, what is your opinion?

Thanks for the patch [~Cyl]. Jenkins failures are not related. Please confirm.
This patch has changes in hadoop-common, hdfs and yarn. Usually tickets will be created per projects. However this change is trivial and it seems fine as single patch.

I will wait for a day or two to see any other objections, else will commit the same.
Yes, [~sunilg], jenkins failures are not releated. Thank you for the review!
Committed to trunk. Seems patch is not applying in branch-2. [~Cyl], please help to provide a branch-2 patch.
branch-2 patch is needed.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #11764 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/11764/])
YARN-6584. Correct license headers in hadoop-common, hdfs, yarn and (sunilg: rev b6f66b0da1cc77f4e61118404a008b4bd7e1a752)
